mapper.select:
select p.PLACE_SERIAL PLACE_SERIAL, p.PARTNER_SERIAL PARTNER_SERIAL, p.PLACE_CODE PLACE_CODE, p.PLACE_NAME PLACE_NAME, p.PLACE_LOCATION PLACE_LOCATION, p.LATITUDE LATITUDE, p.LONGITUDE LONGITUDE, p.GRADE GRADE, p.STATE STATE, p.BREAKFAST BREAKFAST, p.WI_FI WI_FI, p.PARKING PARKING, p.LOCAL_CODE LOCAL_CODE, avg(r.REPUTATION) avg_repu, avg(r.SERVICE) avg_serv, avg(r.ACCESSIBILITY) avg_acces, avg(r.PRICE) avg_price, avg(r.SCALE) avg_scale, avg(r.FOOD) avg_food, count(r.review_serial) cnt_review
from place p, review r
where p.place_serial = r.place_serial
and p.place_serial = ${_parameter}
group by p.PLACE_SERIAL, p.PARTNER_SERIAL, p.PLACE_CODE, p.PLACE_NAME, p.PLACE_LOCATION, p.LATITUDE, p.LONGITUDE, p.GRADE, p.STATE, p.BREAKFAST, p.WI_FI, p.PARKING, p.LOCAL_CODE
